name: Spicy Chile Lime Shrimp
author: sk65
summary: Tiger shrimp are tossed in a spicy chile lime mix. Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 pound cooked tiger shrimp, thawed and tails removed
1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or to taste
⅓ cup milk, or as needed
½ cup vegetable oil for frying
directions: Toss shrimp and soy sauce together in a bowl and set aside
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Saute onion until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes
Add jalapeno peppers, garlic, and ginger
Squeeze in 1/2 of the lime and mix until combined, about 2 minutes
Mix flour, baking powder, and salt together in a bowl
Add milk slowly until batter is thin and runny
Heat 1/2 cup oil in a frying pan
Dip shrimp in batter to lightly coat; fry in batches until golden, about 1 minute per side
Toss fried shrimp with jalapeno mixture
Squeeze remaining lime juice on top
